greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Van Eck sequence (cf. A181391) starting with a(1) = 8.
comment: A van Eck sequence is defined recursively by a(n+1) = min { k > 0 | a(n-k) = a(n) } or 0 if this set is empty. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jun 12 2019
formula: a(n+1) = A181391(n) up to the first occurrence of a(1) = 8 in A181391. - _M. F. Hasler_, Jun 15 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 22 2010
ext: Name edited and cross-references added by _M. F. Hasler_, Jun 12 2019
